name: Venn Lizards: Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Venn - The jigsaw puzzle that breaks all the rules! No more looking for notches that match... you get to focus on an interesting image and see how the circle puzzle pieces overlap. It's an entirely new puzzle system that you have to try!

We've reinvented the jigsaw in a way that makes the image jump off the page. You assemble the pieces by overlapping circles, just like in a Venn diagram.

You'll be puzzling for hours! Venn has a fully curated selection of puzzles to play, each one in 5 different difficulties!

Venn Lizards contains 34 high quality photos we've picked out ourselves, and we're sure you're going to love them! Venn is fun for the whole family, with best times tracked so you can try to beat your friends!

You'll find Venn is easy to learn and is a fun and rewarding game experience - with a great image as the payoff!

Venn is a game by Wiggles 3D, the makers of Quote Slide, Eye Know: Image FX Word Quiz and Lexigo Rush.
